pageProduct.name: Pain Away Professional Pro-Salt X 45Mag Liquid 375ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

For Muscle Performance, Endurance & Stamina needs via Body Bath muscle soak & foot bath soak

Warnings

For external use only. If you have a history of high blood pressure or are pregnant, please consult your health professional before using. If irritation occurs discontine use. If product gets into your eyes rinse thoroughly with clean lukewarm water. Avoid contact with eyes, open wounds & mucous membranes. If you have sensitive skin, test this product on a small area of skin before applying it to a large area. If irritation develops discontine use. Application to the skin may increase senstitivity to sunlight. Contains Ethanol. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Pain Away Professional Pro-Salt X 45Mag Liquid delivers a dose of magnesium through the skin for targeted absorption for your muscles performance, endurance & stamina needs.
Pain Away Professional Pro-Salt X 45Mag Liquid is an ultra high stength magnesium liquid formulation that has been developed in Australia with advise from professional elite athletes & national sporting teams in Australia & around the world.

Ingredients

Magnesium Chloride Hexahydrate. Also contains Lavender Oil, Cajeput Oil, Jojoba Oil, Eucalyptus Oil, Lemon Oil, Spearmint Oil.

Directions

Directions for use - Shake well before use. For Everyday Recovery Body Bath Soak: Pour a cap full and blend into a warm to hot bath. Soak in bath for at least 20-30 muinutes to obtain optimal recovery benefits. For Sports Recovery Body Bath Muscle Soak: Pour 2 caps full and blend into a warm to hot bath. Soak in bath for at least 20-30 muinutes to obtain optimal recovery benefits. For Foot Bath Soak: Pour half a cap and blend into a warm to hot foot bath. Soak feet for at least 10-15 muinutes to obtain optimal recovery benefits. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.
